task.title: TeamWorks - Updated Tip Declaration Process - Quick Reference Guide
task.shortdesc: Partners are responsible for reporting their individual tips. Follow the steps below to declare tips in My Partner Info.
task.taskbody:
Navigate to the Declared Tips section
Select the pay period
For historical declarations, you will need to call the PCC
Select the date and enter the tip amount to be declared
Save Record to enter the tip declaration to SAP
IMG
